mapper.select: select m.perms from sys_menu m left join sys_role_menu rm on m.menu_id = rm.menu_id left join sys_user_role ur on rm.role_id = ur.role_id where ur.user_id = #{userId} and m.perms is not null and m.perms != ''

select distinct m.menu_id, m.parent_id, m.menu_name, m.path, m.component, m.perms, m.icon, m.menu_type, m.order_num, m.status, m.is_show, m.create_time from sys_menu m left join sys_role_menu rm on m.menu_id = rm.menu_id left join sys_user_role ur on rm.role_id = ur.role_id where ur.user_id = #{userId} order by m.order_num
